mapper.select: SELECT a.id, ref1, a.creator, title, a.timeUpdate, `text`, numReply, a.topFlag, a.`draft`, a.`audit`, a.`delFlag`, a.`niceFlag`, a.`form`, a.content, numLike, a.numStart, numStart, `type`, u.`name`, a.`cat1`, n.`name` cat1Name FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.`creator` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN navtab n ON a.`cat1` = n.`id` WHERE ref2 = 0 ORDER BY topFlag DESC, audit DESC, numStart DESC, numReply DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, 10
